      Classes in org.apache.cassandra.io.util that implement DataOutputPlus 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractDataOutput 
      class  DataOutputBuffer
      An implementation of the DataOutputStream interface using a FastByteArrayOutputStream and exposing its buffer so copies can be avoided.
      class  DataOutputByteBuffer
      An implementation of the DataOutputStream interface using a FastByteArrayOutputStream and exposing its buffer so copies can be avoided.
      class  DataOutputStreamAndChannel 
      class  DataOutputStreamPlus
      When possible use DataOutputStreamAndChannel instead of this class, as it will be more efficient.
